from math import *

def fast_exponentiation(base, n):
  if n == 1:
    return base
  else:
    if n % 2 == 0:
      base1 = fast_exponentiation(base, n/2)**2
      return base1%8388608
    else:
      return (base*fast_exponentiation(base,(n-1)/2)**2)%8388608

t = int(raw_input())

    if x == 1:
        print 1

    else:
        print (fast_exponentiation(2,x-1)*x**2-fast_exponentiation(2,x-1)*x + fast_exponentiation(2,x)-1)%8388608
